thread.section_title: Featured Galleries - Tent Pole Focuses - Right Rail
thread.title: NASA astronaut Scott Kelly poses at NRG ahead of Super Bowl 51
thread.title_full: NASA astronaut Scott Kelly poses at NRG ahead of Super Bowl 51

author: Darla Guillen, Houston Chronicle
title: NASA astronaut Scott Kelly poses at NRG ahead of Super Bowl 51
text:
Close Image 1 of 27 NASA astronaut Scott Kelly poses with his girlfriend, Amiko Kauderer. The pair are at NRG Stadium to watch Super Bowl 51. >Click to see Kelly's shot of Super Bowl 50, as well as several stadiums, from his view in space. NASA astronaut Scott Kelly poses with his girlfriend, Amiko Kauderer. The pair are at NRG Stadium to watch Super Bowl 51. >Click to see Kelly's shot of Super Bowl 50, as well as several stadiums, from his view Photo: Scott Kelly/Twitter Image 2 of 27 
NASA astronaut Scott Kelly Sunday tweeted a shot of this view of Super Bowl 50 last year. This year he's at NRG watching Super Bowl 51. 
NASA astronaut Scott Kelly Sunday tweeted a shot of this view of Super Bowl 50 last year. This year he's at NRG watching Super Bowl 51. Photo: Scott Kelly/Twitter Image 3 of 27 Ford Field in Detroit, home of the Detroit Lions, who have started the 2015 season 0-2, just like the Houston Texans. Ford Field in Detroit, home of the Detroit Lions, who have started the 2015 season 0-2, just like the Houston Texans. Photo: Scott Kelly/NASA Image 4 of 27 Mercedes-Benz Superdome in New Orleans, home of the New Orleans Saints, who are in trouble if Drew Brees is indeed ailing. Mercedes-Benz Superdome in New Orleans, home of the New Orleans Saints, who are in trouble if Drew Brees is indeed ailing. Photo: Scott Kelly/NASA Image 5 of 27 Lambeau Field in Green Bay, home of the mighty fantasy football legends the Green Bay Packers and quarterback Aaron Rodgers. Lambeau Field in Green Bay, home of the mighty fantasy football legends the Green Bay Packers and quarterback Aaron Rodgers. Photo: Scott Kelly/NASA Soldier Field in Chicago, home of the hapless, Jay Cutler-led Chicago Bears. Soldier Field in Chicago, home of the hapless, Jay Cutler-led Chicago Bears. Photo: Scott Kelly/NASA Image 7 of 27 Here is NRG Stadium, home of the Houston Texans and J.J. Watt. This isn't a Scott Kelly photo but he's got 14 more weeks of NFL football to take more stadium photos. Here is NRG Stadium, home of the Houston Texans and J.J. Watt. This isn't a Scott Kelly photo but he's got 14 more weeks of NFL football to take more stadium photos. Photo: Scott Kelly/NASA
